mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_gameplay( userid, gameid, nodeid, lastdate ) VALUES( #{userid}, #{gameid}, #{nodeid}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT n.gameid as gameid, n.nodeid as nodeid, n.parentid as parentid, n.nodename as nodename, n.nodecontent as nodecontent FROM user_gameplay p, game_node n WHERE n.nodeid = p.nodeid AND p.userid = #{userid} AND p.gameid = #{gameid}
